description: This file contains mock implementations for file I/O functions used in unit testing, including external declarations and function overrides for fgets, popen, and pclose, all routed through a global mock object.

methods.name: char * fgets(char * str,int n,FILE * stream)
methods.description: Mocked version of the fgets function that delegates to the global FileIOMock object.

methods.name: FILE * popen(const char * command,const char * type)
methods.description: Mocked version of the popen function that delegates to the global FileIOMock object.

methods.name: int pclose(FILE * stream)
methods.description: Mocked version of the pclose function that delegates to the global FileIOMock object.

ctags.name: fgets
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" char * fgets(char * str, int n, FILE * stream)$/

ctags.name: popen
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" FILE * popen(const char * command, const char * type)$/
